member.name: F:NTH.Windows.Forms.FlashWindowFlags.Stop
member.summary: Stop flashing. The system restores the window to its original state.

member.name: F:NTH.Windows.Forms.FlashWindowFlags.All
member.summary: Flash both the window caption and taskbar button. This is equivalent to setting the FlashWindowFlags.Caption | FlashWindowFlags.Tray flags.

member.name: F:NTH.Windows.Forms.FlashWindowFlags.Timer
member.summary: Flash continuously, until the FlashWindowFlags.Stop flag is set.

member.name: F:NTH.Windows.Forms.FlashWindowFlags.TimerNoForeground
member.summary: Flash continuously until the window comes to the foreground.
